DESCRIPTION: Gain an orb slot then channel the listed orb lose an orb slot when a Manifested orb is evoked.

Orb. Passive : Deals damage to a random enemy when activated by a cards effect. Evokes after activating twice. Evoke : Deal damage to a random enemy for each remaining activation and lose and orb slot
Orb. Passive : Draw a card when activated by a cards effect. Evokes after activating 4 times. Evoke : Draw a card for each remaining activation and lose and orb slot
